name: Halloween Connect
description:
Created by Collepic.net.

Rules

  • The object of the game is to remove all pieces.
  • Two pieces with same picture can be removed at a time.
  • Two pieces can be removed only if they can be connected with a maximum of three lines.
  • The game is over when the time is up.

Hint
Click the Hint button to show a pair of pieces which can be removed in exchange for penalty points.

Undo
Click the Undo button to undo a last action in exchange for penalty points.

Shuffle
Click the Shuffle button to shuffle pieces in exchange for penalty points.
